code: public static TriggerId fromHexString(String hexString) {     return new TriggerId(StringUtils.hexStringToByte(hexString)). }
@Override public void serialize(final TriggerId value, final JsonGenerator gen, final SerializerProvider provider) throws IOException {     gen.writeString(value.toString()). }
@Override public TriggerId deserialize(final JsonParser p, final DeserializationContext ctxt) throws IOException {     return TriggerId.fromHexString(p.getValueAsString()). }
